title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate embeddings, list/pull models, and more.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); chat interface, model management, RAG, and plugin system.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, and manage models from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Unofficial Go CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with interactive chat, prompt templates, and output formatting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot UI that connects to any Ollama model; supports conversation memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of ready-to-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU/GPU inference with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag (Python)
summary: Minimal Python RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store to chat with documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; supports threaded replies, model switching, and private channels.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping Ollama REST API with decorators and dependency injection for TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client for Ollama with serde types and streaming support.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; chat and generate endpoints with null-safety and streaming.
